frontmatter.title: Tabs
frontmatter.notes: TODO: Remove subcomponent of deprecated implementation soon

items.title: With screen reader text in notification

props.name: notification
props.docblock: Specifies notification bubble content. It appears on the top right of the `Tab`.

description.text: Specifies notification bubble content. It appears on the top right of the `Tab`.

props.name: eventKey
props.docblock:
A unique identifier for the Component, the `eventKey` makes it distinguishable
from others in a set. Similar to React's `key` prop, in that it only needs to be
unique amongst the Components siblings, not globally.

description.text:
A unique identifier for the Component, the `eventKey` makes it distinguishable
from others in a set. Similar to React's `key` prop, in that it only needs to be
unique amongst the Components siblings, not globally.

props.name: tabClassName
props.docblock: Specifies class name to append to the base element.

description.text: Specifies class name to append to the base element.

props.name: children
props.docblock: Specifies elements that is processed to create tabs.

description.text: Specifies elements that is processed to create tabs.

props.name: className
props.docblock: Specifies class name to append to the base element.

description.text: Specifies class name to append to the base element.

props.name: labels
props.docblock: specifies the list of elements that will be displayed within each of the tabbed views.  It is the content relevant to each label. Children should not be passed as Props, but should instead be nested between the opening and closing `<Tabs> </Tabs>` tags.

description.text: specifies the list of elements that will be displayed within each of the tabbed views.  It is the content relevant to each label. Children should not be passed as Props, but should instead be nested between the opening and closing `<Tabs> </Tabs>` tags.

props.name: children
props.docblock: specifies the list of headings that will appear on all of the tabs that will be created.

description.text: specifies the list of headings that will appear on all of the tabs that will be created.
